description: But there are few places in Singapore where the off-road car can flex its chops. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Car review: Land Rover Defender is fun in the mud
title_page: Car review: Land Rover Defender is fun in the mud | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE â€“ The iconic Land Rover Defender is famed for its off-road capabilities.
And just as topless cars such as roadsters and cabriolets are happiest under the sun, a rugged machine like the Defender is in its element when paved roads end and trails become muddy.
